translations: 市民，自治市；市政公债（municipality 复数形式）

sentences.sentence: These powers were eventually passed to municipalities.
sentences.translation: 这些权力最终转给了市政当局。

sentences.sentence: At the same time the great municipalities went into business to supply lighting, trams and other services to the taxpayers.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，大城市开始涉足商业，为纳税人提供照明、有轨电车和其他服务。

sentences.sentence: At the same time the great municipalities went into business to supply lighting, trams and other services to the taxpayers.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，大城市开始涉足商业，为纳税人提供照明、有轨电车和其他服务。
